idea:
Agriculture needs technology intervention especially after Covid 19. 

Internationally, farmers are switching over to virtual precision framing using Remote Sensing, Thermal and Multi Spectral Cameras, Drones to take care of Agro stresses of water, nutrition, pests and many such stresses. 

Though our farmers can also move to virtual KHETI, However currently there is no ready infrastructure of farmersâ€™ data to be available through digital maps and its linkage to soil map to work out various agriculture parameters and its management for better productivities and yields. As per international norms, Indian farmers yield can easily be increased by 15-20% and with the reduction of costs.

Let us agree that our Indian farms are small as compared to international farms making our task more difficult. 

In these lines we propose to make Indian farms digitally ready for the interventions for remote sensing and imaging by first developing Khet Aadhaar. Through this, it will be easier to provide virtual kheti interventions to the farmers for them to practice precision farming.
